about_the_game:
Game play is limited to the first few towns. Game play should take about 2-3 hours depending on exploring and personal game play.

Journey on a new quest to Preserve life or become the rulers of the realms.
All features of the full game are available, only locations are restricted.

Mild Language including sexual innuendo
Fantasy Violence
Non-explicit Sexual Content
Alcohol References
Simulated Gambling

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz cpu
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 resolution
  • Storage: 535 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Directx sound
  • Additional Notes: Requires Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable 2013 (x86)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual core or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: almost anything
  • Storage: 535 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Directx sound
  • Additional Notes: Requires Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable 2013 (x86)
